and atid = #{atid:INTEGER}
select id as id,name as name from js_activity_template
mapper.insert: insert into js_activity_product ( atid, pid, prizeCode, status, prizeImgUrl, activityPeriods ,appTitle,pcDetailImg,pcBannerUrl,h5BannerUrl) select #{atid:INTEGER} ,#{pid:INTEGER} ,null ,1 ,null, CASE WHEN COUNT(*)=0 THEN '1' ELSE (max(activityPeriods)+1) END as activityPeriods ,#{appTitle},#{pcDetailImg},#{pcBannerUrl},#{h5BannerUrl} from js_activity_product where atid=#{atid:INTEGER} order by activityPeriods desc limit 1
mapper.update: update js_activity_product_invest_info api LEFT join dr_product_invest pi on api.piid=pi.id set api.prizeStatus=2 where pi.pid = #{pid:INTEGER} and api.luckCodes like CONCAT('%', #{prizeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
update js_activity_product_invest_info api LEFT join dr_product_invest pi on api.piid=pi.id set api.prizeStatus=1 where pi.pid =#{pid:INTEGER} and api.prizeStatus!=2
mapper.select: select jap.id as id,CONCAT(jat.name,'-',dpi.fullName,jap.activityPeriods) as name,date_format(dpi.startDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as startDate, date_format(dpi.fullDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as fullDate, (case when jap.status=1 then '进行中' when jap.status=2 then '待开奖' else '已完成' end) as status, sc.cnvalue as cnvalue, jap.prizeCode as prizeCode, (case when jap.status=3 then '已发布' else '未发布' end) as statusCode, dpi.simpleName as simpleName,dpi.amount as amount,dpi.deadline as deadline,dpi.rate as rate, jap.appTitle as appTitle,jap.pcDetailImg as pcDetailImg,jap.pcBannerUrl as pcBannerUrl,jap.h5BannerUrl as h5BannerUrl from js_activity_product jap inner join js_activity_template jat on jat.id=jap.atid inner join dr_product_info dpi on dpi.id =jap.pid inner join sys_chooseoption sc on sc.code=dpi.status and sc.category='productStatus' where jap.id=#{id:INTEGER}

select group_concat(concat(jape.name,'*',jape.amount)) as name from js_activity_product jap inner join js_activity_template jst on jst.id=jap.atid inner join js_activity_prize jape on jape.atid=jst.id where jap.id=#{id:INTEGER}

mapper.select: select count(distinct(dm.uid)) as count ,SUM(IFNULL(pi.amount,0)) as amount from js_activity_product_invest_info api inner join dr_product_invest pi on api.piid=pi.id inner join dr_member dm on dm.uid=pi.uid inner join dr_member_base_info dmbi on dmbi.uid=dm.uid inner join js_activity_product jap on jap.pid=pi.pid where jap.id=#{id:INTEGER}

select count(*) from js_activity_product jap left join dr_product_invest dpi on dpi.pid=jap.pid left join js_activity_product_invest_info api on api.piid=dpi.id where jap.id = #{id:INTEGER} and api.luckCodes like CONCAT('%', #{prizeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select concat(substring(dmbi.realname,1,1),"**")as realname, concat(substring(dm.mobilePhone,1,3),"***",substring(dm.mobilePhone,8)) as mobilePhone , dm.recommCodes as recommCodes, date_format(dpi.investTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as investTime,dpi.amount as amount,api.luckCodes as luckCodes from js_activity_product jap left join dr_product_invest dpi on dpi.pid=jap.pid left join js_activity_product_invest_info api on api.piid=dpi.id left join dr_member dm on dm.uid=dpi.uid left join dr_member_base_info dmbi on dmbi.uid=dm.uid where jap.id = #{id:INTEGER}

select dm.mobilePhone as mobilePhone ,jap.prizeCode as prizeCode ,dm.uid,jap.activityPeriods from js_activity_product jap left join dr_product_invest dpi on dpi.pid=jap.pid left join js_activity_product_invest_info api on api.piid=dpi.id left join dr_member dm on dm.uid=dpi.uid where jap.id = #{id:INTEGER} GROUP BY dm.uid
